entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
